MessageHistory.MessageNull:
Failed to get change history: message not found. 
Probable reasons: 
- Wrong ID 
- Message deleted 
- The bot no longer has access to it.
MessageHistory.MessageIgnore:
Failed to get change history, [message]({0}) is ignored. 
Probable reasons: 
- Message written by bot
MessageHistory.MessageWithoutHistory:
Failed to get change history [message]({0}) - not found. 
Probable reasons: 
- Message was written before the bot appeared on the server 
- The bot was offline while writing the message 
- Message was written in the log channel 
 
Message is logged in.
MessageHistory.OnDeleteWithoutHistory:
Failed to get message change history - not found. 
Probable reasons: 
- Message was written before the bot appeared on the server 
- The bot was offline while writing the message
MessageHistory.ImageDescription: The history of the [message]({0}) is reflected in the image above.
